scripts.build: echo Building... && yarn clean && yarn compile && yarn xy lint && yarn xy knip
scripts.clean: echo Cleaning... && yarn rimraf --glob "dist" && yarn rimraf --glob "packages/*/dist"
scripts.compile: echo Compiling... && yarn workspace @xylabs/ts-scripts-yarn3 package-compile && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt --exclude @xylabs/ts-scripts-yarn3 run package-compile
scripts.deploy-common: yarn build && yarn version apply --all && yarn workspaces foreach --all --parallel npm publish
scripts.deploy-major: yarn workspaces foreach --all version major --deferred && yarn deploy-common
scripts.deploy-minor: yarn workspaces foreach --all version minor --deferred && yarn deploy-common
scripts.deploy-next: yarn workspaces foreach --all version minor --deferred && yarn build && yarn version apply --all --prerelease && yarn workspaces foreach --all --parallel npm publish --tag next
scripts.deploy-next-major: yarn workspaces foreach --all version major --deferred && yarn build && yarn version apply --all --prerelease && yarn workspaces foreach --all --parallel npm publish --tag next
scripts.deploy-patch: yarn workspaces foreach --all version patch --deferred && yarn deploy-common
